name: cosmo fighter
description:
This is a retro style shooter game.

The difficulty level is low, anyone can enjoy it.
Enjoy the retro shooter game atmosphere.

It's like a Game Boy when playing on a smartphone because it has a original virtua pad.

4 stages in all.

You can play up to 2 stages in the browser.
Please download the app version if you want to play whole stages.

-Controls
Direction button - movement of own machine. Direction input
A button (X) - decision, bullet shot.
B button (Z) - not used in this game
START button (Enter) - game start, pause

-Music
PANICPUMPKIN
http://pansound.com/panicpumpkin
